title: Quarantine Check-In #3 🥓👨‍⚕️🎸
description:
Kevin Bacon picks up the phone to talk with Justin and Christian about the loss of musician John Prine. And Kevin is joined by his wife Kyra Sedgwick for a serenade! by Kevin and Kyra Sedgwick.. And Dr. Dave Kessler tells us how things are faring in New York. Plus, Justin and Christian respond to listeners making much ado about their misuse of “adieu.”

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
